full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### EP119-241485_200 Sacré Coeur Lockers

#### Tender Information

* Reference Number: WS4386814082-Doc4387564919
* Amendment Number: 0
* Solicitation Number: WS4386814082

#### Tender Details

* Publication Date: January 11, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: January 25, 2024, 14:00 EST
* Amendment Date: January 11, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 15, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: None

#### Tender Status

* The tender is expired.

#### Contract Specifications

* UNSPSC Code: 56100000 (Accommodation Furniture)
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Selective Tendering

#### Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements

* The tender is open to suppliers who have a trade agreement with Canada, including:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

#### Regions of Opportunity

* None

#### Regions of Delivery

* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Ottawa

#### Contracting Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Contact Information

* King Quan, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: king.quan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

#### Tender URL

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18465771?extsite=MTg0NjU3NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Tender Description

Please note that the response deadline closing time has been modified. All supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on January 25, 2024, by 14:00 EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.
